metadata.title: CVE-2021-27919 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: archive/zip in Go 1.16.x before 1.16.1 allows attackers to cause a denialof service (panic) upon attempted use of the Reader.Open API for a ZIParchive in which ../ occurs at the beginning of any filename.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
